product_name: DysonSpecial Edition Dyson Supersonic Nural Hair Dryer in Red Velvet and Gold
summary: SummarySpecial edition Dyson Supersonic Nural‚Ñ¢ in Red velvet and Gold. A network of Nural‚Ñ¢ sensors automatically adjusts airflow and temperature to enhance natural shine and protect scalp health.¬π
details: DetailsBenefitsHelps protect hair from root to tip for long term shineHelps prevent over drying for healthy looking and smooth hair¬πLearns and remembers your styling routine and automatically adjusts to your go-to airflow and heat settings as you styleCustomizable to your styling preferencesFive attachments engineered to style all hair typesFeaturesA network of Nural‚Ñ¢ sensors within the machine activate intelligent features automatically to optimize your styling routine.Scalp protect mode automatically adjusts air temperature to maintain an optimal target temperature of 130¬∞F at the scalp for comfortable, close-up drying.¬≤Attachment learning recognizes each attachment and remembers your styling preferences. Intelligent attachments automatically adjust to your preferred airflow and heat settings for easier styling.¬≥Pause detect knows when you‚Äôve paused styling. When no motion is detected, the machine will automatically switch off the heater and reduce airflow. When it‚Äôs picked back up, it‚Äôs reactivated.Capsule illumination changes color to indicate what heat setting you are in, so you always know how much heat you‚Äôre using. Clear endcap lets you see Dyson‚Äôs pioneering technology at work.IncludesWave+Curl diffuser is 2-in-1 diffuser: Dome mode draws air into the dome and infuses it through the hair to enhance natural waves or curls for a more defined finish.‚Å¥ Diffuse mode gently disperses airflow through longer prongs for voluminous curls and coils.Gentle air attachment evenly diffuses airflow for fast, yet gentle styling in Scalp protect mode.Styling concentrator is re-engineered with a wider, thinner blade of air for precision styling. Compatible with Scalp protect mode.Wide-tooth comb shapes and lengthens curly and coily hair.Flyaway attachment finishes sleek, straight styles with Coanda airflow to hide flyaways.‚ÅµSpecial edition presentation case to protect and neatly store your Dyson Supersonic Nural‚Ñ¢. Finished in black with a red stripe, cushioned with soft fabric and with a removable lid that is also a non-slip mat for your Supersonic Nural‚Ñ¢.Item 2644322How To UseStart with clean, wet hair.For a smooth look, use the Gentle air attachment in Scalp protect mode to rough dry roots before styling. Section hair and use the Styling concentrator and a round brush to style one section at a time. Once hair is dry, use Flyaway attachment to create a smooth, shiny finish.Enhance your natural curl pattern with two modes using the Wave+Curl diffuser. Separate the prongs from the center of the diffuser for Dome mode to create natural waves or use in Diffuse mode for textured curls.Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: Start with clean, wet hair.For a smooth look, use the Gentle air attachment in Scalp protect mode to rough dry roots before styling. Section hair and use the Styling concentrator and a round brush to style one section at a time. Once hair is dry, use Flyaway attachment to create a smooth, shiny finish.Enhance your natural curl pattern with two modes using the Wave+Curl diffuser. Separate the prongs from the center of the diffuser for Dome mode to create natural waves or use in Diffuse mode for textured curls.
